update_required_message: A new version is available. Please update to continue using the app.
patch_download_message: A new update is available to improve your experience.
patch_restart_instruction: Note: After updating, you need to close and restart the app for changes to take effect.
close_app_instruction: Completely close the app (force stop or swipe away from recent apps)
update_active_instruction: The latest update will be active
update_download_failed: Failed to download update. Please try again later.
